Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Extends the expiration of the mortgage recording tax imposed by the city of Yonkers
Summary: Extends the expiration of the mortgage recording tax imposed by the city of Yonkers to August 31, 2021.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to extending the expiration of the mortgage recording tax imposed by the city of Yonkers
